name: DecisionMaker
0:
”Alexa, ask Decision Maker what I should do”
”Alexa, tell Decision Maker it's up to you”
”Alexa, tell Decision Maker to give me some advice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: decision maker
des: Ever struggled to decide on something? Let Alexa do it for you! Ask it for advice and get a yes-or-no response. Like flipping a coin for the 21st century!
